item.title: Unboxing the SharePoint Framework (SPFx) v1.15.2 release
item.description: In this video, MVP Andrew Connell summarize what he found while picking apart this latest release of the SharePoint Framework (SPFx): v1.15.2.

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 - how cool is that? - Configuring settings
item.description: CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross platform command line tool based on Node.js that helps you manage many things around Microsoft 365 and your SPFx projects (yes, that as well ðŸ¤©. rename, upgrade … you name it). You may manage OneDrive, Planner, Power Apps and Automate, Teams, Yammer, SharePoint (of course). The list keeps on growing and growing. Lets check CLI for Microsoft 365 settings and how to configure them.

item.title: Patterns and Practices for SPFx Development
item.description: When building any solution, whether it is SPFx-based or with any other programming language, it is best to make it loosely coupled to achieve easy maintenance and scalability.

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 - how cool is that? - Tips and tricks
item.description: CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross platform command line tool based on Node.js that helps you manage many things around Microsoft 365 and your SPFx project (yes, that as well ðŸ¤©. rename, upgrade … you name it). You may manage OneDrive, Planner, Power Apps and Automate, Teams, Yammer, SharePoint (of course). The list keeps on growing and growing. Lets check some tips and tricks which may improve your experience with CLI for Microsoft 365.

item.title: How to Display Data from Multiple SharePoint Lists using PnPjs and DataTables
item.description: In this article, we will learn how to use PnPjs to get data from multiple SharePoint lists and display the collected data in a jQuery Datatables in SharePoint 2013/2016/2019 or online without a SPFx webpart.

item.title: M365 Development Security - From full trust to ZeroTrust
item.description: This article will showcase typical SharePoint and Microsoft 365 development security patterns. Those patterns can be applied especially in so-called ZeroTrust environments, too, and are linked to step-by-step implementation guidances.

item.dc:creator: Markus Moeller
